definitions.definition: A band of frequencies , in a sound spectrum , that have a greater intensity ; they determine the quality of a sound; especially the characteristic sounds of the consonants .
Synonym of formative ( “ language unit , typically a morph , that has a morphological function ” ) .

main_definition: ( physics , phonetics ) A band of frequencies , in a sound spectrum , that have a greater intensity ; they determine the quality of a sound; especially the characteristic sounds of the consonants .
secondary_definitions: ( linguistic morphology ) Synonym of formative ( “ language unit , typically a morph , that has a morphological function ” ) .
